snippet: Detroit won for the ninth time in 10 games, but Miguel Cabrera was out of the lineup with an injury, and Jhonny Peralta was facing a possible suspension.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; Detroit Tigers 11-1 rout of the Washington Nationals is overshadowed by third baseman Miguel Cabrera's injury and possible suspension of shortstop Jhonny Peralta, who is among the players linked to the Biogenesis case; other MLB scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Detroit won for the ninth time in 10 games, but Miguel Cabrera was out of the lineup with an injury, and Jhonny Peralta was facing a possible suspension.

headline.main: Tigers’ Rout Overshadowed by Injury and Possible Suspension
headline.print_headline: Tigers’ Rout Overshadowed by Injury and Possible Suspension
